name: Thelazyparrot-repeatswhatyousay(lazily)
0:
”Alexa, start the lazy parrot”
”How are you doing today?”
”Please stop repeating what I say!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the lazy parrot
des: This is fun little skill for kids just learning to talk. It will repeat back what you say but it will respond in a progressively tired manner. Just keep talking with it until it becomes super tired and leaves.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
